source: TEXT_JOBDRK520_02060_SEQ_00<tab>Sidurgu would entreat a fellow dark knight for aid.
target: TEXT_JOBDRK520_02060_SEQ_00<tab>Sidurgu a une histoire à vous raconter.

source: TEXT_JOBDRK520_02060_SEQ_01<tab>On his deathbed, Sidurgu's master spoke of a “flame in the abyss,” a concept which Sidurgu and Fray did not understand. In following the creed of their predecessors, they hoped that the meaning would become clear to them in time. Alas, when they intervened to save the life of a young girl, they were marked for death by the order. Fray was captured and executed in a trial by combat, leaving Sidurgu to care for Rielle by himself. Fearing that he cannot handle the task alone, he implores you to join his cause, and you agree. Perhaps now would be a good time to get to know Rielle.
target: TEXT_JOBDRK520_02060_SEQ_01<tab>Sidurgu vous a confié les dernières paroles de son maître dont Fray et lui n'ont jamais réussi à saisir le sens. Il vous a ensuite raconté sa rencontre avec Rielle qui, pour une raison qui lui échappe, est pourchassée par les templiers. Vous lui avez alors promis de l'aider à protéger la jeune fille, en échange de quoi il vous enseignera ses techniques de chevalier noir. Faites con<var 16 /var>nais<var 16 /var>san<var 16 /var>ce avec Rielle.

source: TEXT_JOBDRK520_02060_SEQ_02<tab>Though somewhat standoffish, Rielle responds to your inquiries as best she can. Satisfied that you have established a rudimentary rapport, Sidurgu interrupts with his latest plan. Since the Temple Knights appear to be convinced that Rielle is some sort of abomination, Sidurgu would first determine if there is anything unusual about her. To that end, he proposes that you seek out a Vanu healer in the Sea of Clouds, as some are said to possess the ability to see their patients' aether. Rendezvous with him in Camp Cloudtop.
target: TEXT_JOBDRK520_02060_SEQ_02<tab>Vous avez échangé quelques mots avec Rielle, qui vous a paru refermée sur elle-même. Sidurgu, qui aimerait savoir pourquoi les templiers l'ont qualifiée d'“abomination”, a décidé de rendre visite aux chamans vanu vanu afin d'obtenir des éclaircissements. Partez les retrouver au camp de Cime-des-nuages.

source: TEXT_JOBDRK520_02060_SEQ_03<tab>For the most part, the Vanu Vanu are disinclined to parley with outsiders. However, they may be willing to grant your request in exchange for a suitable offering. Sidurgu asks that you seek out and slay gastornis for their feathers, as it is said the Vanu use them in their rituals.
target: TEXT_JOBDRK520_02060_SEQ_03<tab>La plupart des Vanu Vanu sont hostiles aux étrangers. C'est pourquoi Sidurgu vous a conseillé de leur apporter un présent pour leur prouver vos bonnes intentions. Chassez les gastornis qui rôdent dans les environs pour obtenir trois de leurs plumes.

source: TEXT_JOBDRK520_02060_SEQ_04<tab>You procure the feathers with little difficulty. Journey now into Vanu territory and pray that you can find a healer willing to hear you out.
target: TEXT_JOBDRK520_02060_SEQ_04<tab>Vous avez réuni trois plumes de gastornis. Rendez-vous maintenant à Vundu Ok' Bendu pour les remettre à un chaman vanu vanu.

source: TEXT_JOBDRK520_02060_SEQ_05<tab>Fortuitously, you encounter a Vanu healer willing to examine Rielle in exchange for your offering of feathers. Arms held high, she begins chanting, her voice rising in intensity, until she gasps in surprise. A great spirit dwells within her, the healer begins─but before she can finish, she senses others following in your wake and flees. Turning towards the road, Sidurgu readies his sword and bids you search for your pursuers while he guards Rielle.
target: TEXT_JOBDRK520_02060_SEQ_05<tab>Vous avez remis les plumes à un chaman vanu vanu qui, en échange, a accepté d'examiner Rielle. Il vous a appris qu'un “esprit supérieur” semblait habiter la jeune fille... avant de s'enfuir, pris de panique. À ce moment, Sidurgu a remarqué que vous aviez été suivis. Rendez-vous à l'endroit indiqué et scrutez les alentours pour découvrir qui vous observe.

source: TEXT_JOBDRK520_02060_SEQ_06<tab>You come upon Temple Knights, who mark you for a foe at once. The battle is joined and soon ended. Return to Sidurgu and let him know what you found.
target: TEXT_JOBDRK520_02060_SEQ_06<tab>Vous avez rapidement éliminé les templiers qui avaient eu la mauvaise idée de vous attaquer. Retournez auprès de Sidurgu pour lui raconter ce qui vient de se passer.

source: TEXT_JOBDRK520_02060_SEQ_07<tab>With the Vanu healer long gone, there is no reason to remain in the Sea of Clouds. Return to the Forgotten Knight with Sidurgu and Rielle.
target: TEXT_JOBDRK520_02060_SEQ_07<tab>Le chaman vanu vanu parti depuis longtemps, vous n'avez plus rien à faire à Vundu Ok' Bendu. Retournez au Chevalier oublié pour retrouver Sidurgu et Rielle.

source:
TEXT_JOBDRK520_02060_SEQ_08Cursing the Temple Knights for their savagery, Sidurgu nearly flies into a rage, until Rielle's sudden apology for being the cause of your distress saps the dark knight of his anger. Though the motives of the Temple Knights yet remain a mystery, it is clear now that there is something rather unusual about the young girl they so fervently pursue.

※The next dark knight quest will be available from Sidurgu upon reaching level 54.
target:
TEXT_JOBDRK520_02060_SEQ_08Sidurgu semblait particulièrement remonté contre les templiers, qu'il a qualifiés de criminels agissant sous le couvert de l'Église. Bien que vous ne connaissiez pas encore les véritables motifs de ces hommes, vous allez devoir rester vigilant pour empêcher que Rielle tombe entre leurs mains.
* Sidurgu propose la prochaine quête aux chevaliers noirs de niveau 54.

source: TEXT_JOBDRK520_02060_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Rielle.
target: TEXT_JOBDRK520_02060_TODO_00<tab>Parler à Rielle

source: TEXT_JOBDRK520_02060_TODO_01<tab>Rendezvous with Sidurgu at Camp Cloudtop.
target: TEXT_JOBDRK520_02060_TODO_01<tab>Retrouver Sidurgu au camp de Cime-des-nuages

source: TEXT_JOBDRK520_02060_TODO_02<tab>Slay gastornis and obtain their feathers.
target: TEXT_JOBDRK520_02060_TODO_02<tab>Tuer <var 33 ((BNpcName)) 02F20DA70302 /var> pour obtenir leurs plumes

source: TEXT_JOBDRK520_02060_TODO_03<tab>Present the feathers to the Vanu Vanu healer.

source: TEXT_JOBDRK520_02060_SIDURGU_000_000<tab>I see you yet walk the path, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>...and it is well that you do. This is a matter I can discuss only with another dark knight. Swear to me that you will speak of it to no one else.
target: TEXT_JOBDRK520_02060_SIDURGU_000_000<tab>Je constate avec plaisir que tu suis la voie, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Tu fais bien. Il y a quelque chose que j'aimerais te raconter, mais tu dois me jurer que tu n'en parleras à personne.

source: TEXT_JOBDRK520_02060_SIDURGU_000_001<tab>Thank you. Then I shall begin at the beginning.
target: TEXT_JOBDRK520_02060_SIDURGU_000_001<tab>... Très bien. Commençons par le début.

source: TEXT_JOBDRK520_02060_SIDURGU_000_002<tab>Our master, in his final moments, spoke to Fray and me in riddles...
target: TEXT_JOBDRK520_02060_SIDURGU_000_002<tab>Dans ses derniers instants, notre maître s'est adressé à Fray et moi de manière plutôt... énigmatique.

source: TEXT_JOBDRK520_02060_SIDURGU_000_003<tab>“A heart bleeds, a man weeps, a soul burns. Thence comes the darkness, to consume...”
target: TEXT_JOBDRK520_02060_SIDURGU_000_003<tab>“Un homme souffre, son cœur saigne, son âme brûle. De là viennent les ténèbres, pour le consumer...”

source: TEXT_JOBDRK520_02060_SIDURGU_000_004<tab>“Yet even in the depths, the flame endures...”
target: TEXT_JOBDRK520_02060_SIDURGU_000_004<tab>“Mais au plus profond de lui, la passion perdure...”

source: TEXT_JOBDRK520_02060_SIDURGU_000_005<tab>“Submit to the flame and harness the abyss...”
target: TEXT_JOBDRK520_02060_SIDURGU_000_005<tab>“Laissez-vous gagner par la flamme pour maîtriser le pouvoir des abysses...”

source: TEXT_JOBDRK520_02060_SIDURGU_000_006<tab>Fray and I did not understand his words. We hoped their meaning would become clear to us in the course of our duties as dark knights.
target: TEXT_JOBDRK520_02060_SIDURGU_000_006<tab>Nous n'avons pas compris ce qu'il essayait de nous dire. Nous nous sommes dit que le sens de ses paroles deviendrait plus clair au fil de nos expériences de chevaliers noirs...

source: TEXT_JOBDRK520_02060_SIDURGU_000_007<tab>And so we carried on, following the creed, until one day, we found her.
target: TEXT_JOBDRK520_02060_SIDURGU_000_007<tab>Nous avons donc suivi la voie, sans jamais oublier les en<var 16 /var>sei<var 16 /var>gne<var 16 /var>ments de notre maître. Jusqu'au jour où nous avons trouvé Rielle.

source: TEXT_JOBDRK520_02060_RIELLE_000_008<tab>...
target: TEXT_JOBDRK520_02060_RIELLE_000_008<tab>...

source: TEXT_JOBDRK520_02060_SIDURGU_000_009<tab><sigh> ...Go on, Rielle. <var 08 E905 ((She)) ((He)) /var> can be trusted.
target: TEXT_JOBDRK520_02060_SIDURGU_000_009<tab>Sois sans crainte, Rielle. Nous pouvons lui faire confiance.

source: TEXT_JOBDRK520_02060_RIELLE_000_010<tab>...All right.
target: TEXT_JOBDRK520_02060_RIELLE_000_010<tab>... Pardon.

source: TEXT_JOBDRK520_02060_RIELLE_000_011<tab>Halone's blessings be upon you, <var 08 E905 ((miss)) ((sir)) /var>.
target: TEXT_JOBDRK520_02060_RIELLE_000_011<tab>Halone vous bénisse, <var 08 E905 ((Madame)) ((Messire)) /var>.

source: TEXT_JOBDRK520_02060_SIDURGU_000_012<tab>Right, then...
target: TEXT_JOBDRK520_02060_SIDURGU_000_012<tab>Bien.

source: TEXT_JOBDRK520_02060_SIDURGU_000_013<tab>She was fleeing from a unit of Temple Knights at the time, who were clearly intent on doing her harm. Needless to say, Fray and I took issue with that, and chose to intervene.
target: TEXT_JOBDRK520_02060_SIDURGU_000_013<tab>Ce jour-là, elle essayait d'échapper à un groupe de templiers. Comme il nous a paru évident qu'ils lui voulaient du mal, Fray et moi avons décidé d'intervenir.

source: TEXT_JOBDRK520_02060_SIDURGU_000_014<tab>We went to ground after that, but Fray was caught out in the streets while fetching supplies...
target: TEXT_JOBDRK520_02060_SIDURGU_000_014<tab>Nous avons fait profil bas après cet épisode, mais Fray a été arrêté en pleine rue alors qu'il était sorti nous procurer des vivres...

source: TEXT_JOBDRK520_02060_SIDURGU_000_015<tab>...I cannot protect her, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Not from the Temple Knights. Not by myself. I'm not even sure why they seek her...only that should I fail, her life is forfeit.
target: TEXT_JOBDRK520_02060_SIDURGU_000_015<tab>... À moi tout seul, je ne peux pas la protéger des templiers. Je ne sais même pas ce qu'ils lui veulent... Une seule chose est sûre, si j'échoue, elle le paiera de sa vie.

source: TEXT_JOBDRK520_02060_SIDURGU_000_016<tab>Help me, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, and I shall share with you my arts. And when we have reached the limits of my knowledge, mayhap we can unravel the mystery of my master's final words together.
target: TEXT_JOBDRK520_02060_SIDURGU_000_016<tab>Aide-moi, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, et je partagerai les arcanes de mes techniques avec toi. Quand je t'aurai tout appris, nous pourrons peut-être percer ensemble le secret des paroles de mon maître.

source: TEXT_JOBDRK520_02060_SIDURGU_000_017<tab>I can offer you naught else. What say you?
target: TEXT_JOBDRK520_02060_SIDURGU_000_017<tab>C'est tout ce que je peux t'offrir. Qu'en dis-tu<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_JOBDRK520_02060_SIDURGU_000_018<tab>Then it is settled. We shall both serve as her guardians.
target: TEXT_JOBDRK520_02060_SIDURGU_000_018<tab>C'est décidé, dans ce cas. Toi et moi, nous serons ses protecteurs.

source: TEXT_JOBDRK520_02060_SIDURGU_000_019<tab>Don't you have something to say to <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, Rielle?
target: TEXT_JOBDRK520_02060_SIDURGU_000_019<tab>Tu ne veux pas dire quelque chose à <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, Rielle<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_JOBDRK520_02060_RIELLE_000_020<tab>...
target: TEXT_JOBDRK520_02060_RIELLE_000_020<tab>...

source: TEXT_JOBDRK520_02060_SIDURGU_000_030<tab>Talk to her a little. Ask her about herself.
target: TEXT_JOBDRK520_02060_SIDURGU_000_030<tab>Tu peux lui parler un peu, lui poser quelques questions, si tu veux.

source: TEXT_JOBDRK520_02060_RIELLE_000_040<tab>...Yes?
target: TEXT_JOBDRK520_02060_RIELLE_000_040<tab>... Oui<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_JOBDRK520_02060_Q1_000_041<tab>What will you ask?
target: TEXT_JOBDRK520_02060_Q1_000_041<tab>Que demandez-vous<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_JOBDRK520_02060_A1_000_042<tab>Why did the Temple Knights want to hurt you?
target: TEXT_JOBDRK520_02060_A1_000_042<tab>Que te voulaient les templiers<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_JOBDRK520_02060_A1_000_043<tab>Where are your parents?
target: TEXT_JOBDRK520_02060_A1_000_043<tab>Où sont tes parents<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_JOBDRK520_02060_A1_000_044<tab>What do you think of Sidurgu?
target: TEXT_JOBDRK520_02060_A1_000_044<tab>Que penses-tu de Sidurgu<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_JOBDRK520_02060_A1_000_045<tab>Nothing.
target: TEXT_JOBDRK520_02060_A1_000_045<tab>Rien

source: TEXT_JOBDRK520_02060_RIELLE_000_050<tab>They...they said I was an abomination. That I had to die to atone for my sins...
target: TEXT_JOBDRK520_02060_RIELLE_000_050<tab>Ils... Ils ont dit que j'étais une abomination. Que je devais mourir pour expier mes péchés...

source: TEXT_JOBDRK520_02060_RIELLE_000_055<tab>I...I...
target: TEXT_JOBDRK520_02060_RIELLE_000_055<tab>...

source: TEXT_JOBDRK520_02060_RIELLE_000_060<tab>He doesn't talk as much. Not since Fray left. Sometimes he hardly speaks a word. Other times... But I know he would never hurt me.
target: TEXT_JOBDRK520_02060_RIELLE_000_060<tab>Il ne me parle plus beaucoup, depuis que Fray est parti. Il reste souvent silencieux, sauf quand il... Tout ce dont je suis encore sûre, c'est qu'il ne me ferait jamais de mal.

source: TEXT_JOBDRK520_02060_RIELLE_000_065<tab>Excuse me...<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, was it?
target: TEXT_JOBDRK520_02060_RIELLE_000_065<tab>Excusez-moi... <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, c'est bien ça<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_JOBDRK520_02060_RIELLE_000_066<tab>You'll look after Sid too, won't you?
target: TEXT_JOBDRK520_02060_RIELLE_000_066<tab>Vous allez veiller sur Sid, n'est-ce pas<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_JOBDRK520_02060_RIELLE_000_067<tab>Thank you. That puts my mind at ease...
target: TEXT_JOBDRK520_02060_RIELLE_000_067<tab>Merci. Je serai plus tranquille...

source: TEXT_JOBDRK520_02060_SIDURGU_000_068<tab>Right, that's enough of that. To more important matters...
target: TEXT_JOBDRK520_02060_SIDURGU_000_068<tab>Bon, ça suffit. Nous avons des problèmes plus importants à régler.

source: TEXT_JOBDRK520_02060_SIDURGU_000_069<tab>Like I said before, I'm not quite sure why the Temple Knights are after Rielle.
target: TEXT_JOBDRK520_02060_SIDURGU_000_069<tab>Comme je te l'ai dit, je ne sais pas pourquoi les templiers en ont après Rielle. Il y a forcément quelque chose chez elle qui justifie leur acharnement, mais quoi...

source: TEXT_JOBDRK520_02060_SIDURGU_000_070<tab>They seem to believe something is wrong with her, but for the life of me, I cannot imagine what it could be...
target: TEXT_JOBDRK520_02060_SIDURGU_000_070<tab>Cependant, il y a peut-être un moyen de le savoir. L'autre jour, j'ai entendu une curieuse histoire de la bouche d'un chevalier des Haillenarte qui revenait de L'Écume des cieux d'Abalathia...

source: TEXT_JOBDRK520_02060_SIDURGU_000_071<tab>However, there may be a way to find out. The other day, I overheard a curious tale from a House Haillenarte knight recently returned from Camp Cloudtop. He spoke of Vanu healers who could <var 1A 02 /var>see<var 1A 01 /var> their patients' aether. So skilled were these healers that they could diagnose ailments with a glance.
target: TEXT_JOBDRK520_02060_SIDURGU_000_071<tab>Il aurait vu des chamans vanu vanu capables de <var 1A 02 /var>lire<var 1A 01 /var> l'éther de leurs patients. D'après lui, ils sont si doués qu'ils sauraient diagnostiquer n'importe quelle maladie en un coup d'œil.

source: TEXT_JOBDRK520_02060_SIDURGU_000_072<tab>It may be naught more than a fantastical tale told by a man in his cups, but even so, if there is a chance we could learn what─if aught─ails Rielle, I daresay we must take it. Let us go to Camp Cloudtop and begin our search for a healer there.
target: TEXT_JOBDRK520_02060_SIDURGU_000_072<tab>Ce n'est peut-être que de la fabulation, mais s'il y a la moindre chance d'apprendre quelque chose sur Rielle, je pense que ça vaut la peine d'essayer. Partons pour le camp de Cime-des-nuages et essayons de trouver un de ces chamans.

source: TEXT_JOBDRK520_02060_SIDURGU_000_080<tab>For Rielle's sake, I say we see if there is any truth to this rumor...
target: TEXT_JOBDRK520_02060_SIDURGU_000_080<tab>Nous devons tenter notre chance, pour Rielle...

source: TEXT_JOBDRK520_02060_RIELLE_000_085<tab>Did you know Fray too? He was a good teacher...and a friend.
target: TEXT_JOBDRK520_02060_RIELLE_000_085<tab>...

source: TEXT_JOBDRK520_02060_RIELLE_000_090<tab>How is it that they float like that? I've never seen anything quite like it...
target: TEXT_JOBDRK520_02060_RIELLE_000_090<tab>Comment ces îles peuvent-elles flotter ainsi<var 1D /var>? Je n'ai jamais rien vu de tel...

source: TEXT_JOBDRK520_02060_SIDURGU_000_100<tab>...Right, then.
target: TEXT_JOBDRK520_02060_SIDURGU_000_100<tab>... Allons chercher ces chamans.

source: TEXT_JOBDRK520_02060_SIDURGU_000_101<tab>The Vanu Vanu are not wont to parley with outsiders under most circumstances. However, they may be willing to receive us if we come bearing a suitable offering.
target: TEXT_JOBDRK520_02060_SIDURGU_000_101<tab>Les Vanu Vanu ne parlent pas facilement aux étrangers. En revanche, si nous leur apportons un présent approprié, ils accepteront peut-être de nous recevoir.

source: TEXT_JOBDRK520_02060_SIDURGU_000_102<tab>I am told they use gastornis feathers in their rituals. Mayhap that would suffice...
target: TEXT_JOBDRK520_02060_SIDURGU_000_102<tab>Il me semble qu'ils se servent de plumes de gastornis dans leurs rituels... Ça pourrait peut-être suffire.

source: TEXT_JOBDRK520_02060_SIDURGU_000_103<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, I must ask that you prepare our offering while I look after Rielle. Once you have it, we can journey to Vundu Ok' Bendu together and entreat one of their healers to examine her.
target: TEXT_JOBDRK520_02060_SIDURGU_000_103<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, tu veux bien te charger d'aller en collecter quelques-unes pendant que je surveille Rielle<var 1D /var>? Quand tu seras de retour, nous partirons pour Vundu Ok' Bendu afin de la faire examiner par un de ces chamans.

source: TEXT_JOBDRK520_02060_RIELLE_000_110<tab>I feel fine, really...
target: TEXT_JOBDRK520_02060_RIELLE_000_110<tab>M-mais... je vais bien...

source: TEXT_JOBDRK520_02060_RIELLE_000_115<tab>Please take care, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>...
target: TEXT_JOBDRK520_02060_RIELLE_000_115<tab>Soyez prudent<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var>, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Je vous accompagnerais bien...

source: TEXT_JOBDRK520_02060_SIDURGU_000_117<tab>The Temple Knights have eyes everywhere, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. I dare not leave her unattended.
target: TEXT_JOBDRK520_02060_SIDURGU_000_117<tab>Les templiers du Saint-Siège ont des yeux partout. Je ne peux pas me permettre de laisser Rielle sans sur<var 16 /var>veil<var 16 /var>lan<var 16 /var>ce.

source: TEXT_JOBDRK520_02060_VANUVANU02060_000_120<tab>What mistral gale blows netherlings this far!? Away with you, away!
target: TEXT_JOBDRK520_02060_VANUVANU02060_000_120<tab>Quel sinistre vent vous amène, gens d'en bas<var 1D /var>? Allez-vous-en<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBDRK520_02060_VANUVANU02060_000_121<tab>Gastornis feathers? Hmmm... Netherling knows the ways of the Vundu well.
target: TEXT_JOBDRK520_02060_VANUVANU02060_000_121<tab>Les plumes du rituel sacré<var 1D /var>? Hmmm... Vous semblez bien connaître les traditions vundu.

source: TEXT_JOBDRK520_02060_VANUVANU02060_000_122<tab>Let storm clouds give way to warm sunshine. Say your piece!
target: TEXT_JOBDRK520_02060_VANUVANU02060_000_122<tab>Que voulez-vous à notre tribu<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_JOBDRK520_02060_SIDURGU_000_123<tab>She will do as we ask, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>?
target: TEXT_JOBDRK520_02060_SIDURGU_000_123<tab>Alors, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var><var 1D /var>? Le chaman vanu vanu accepte de nous aider<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_JOBDRK520_02060_VANUVANU02060_000_124<tab>Bring forth the child, netherlings. Let me look upon her face and know her heart!
target: TEXT_JOBDRK520_02060_VANUVANU02060_000_124<tab>Montrez-moi l'enfant. Laissez-moi regarder son visage et voir à travers les nuages qui cachent son cœur<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBDRK520_02060_VANUVANU02060_000_125<tab>Soft rains to soothe your heart, little one. Do not be afraid.
target: TEXT_JOBDRK520_02060_VANUVANU02060_000_125<tab>N'aie pas peur, petite d'en bas. Laisse-toi bercer par la douce brise...

source: TEXT_JOBDRK520_02060_VANUVANU02060_000_126<tab>Drink of the winds! Let thy soul take flight! Bathe in the mists and show me thy light!
target: TEXT_JOBDRK520_02060_VANUVANU02060_000_126<tab>Que les vents éclaircissent les cieux et emportent ton âme au firmament<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBDRK520_02060_VANUVANU02060_000_127<tab>Come, come, show me thy light...
target: TEXT_JOBDRK520_02060_VANUVANU02060_000_127<tab>Là-haut, tout là-haut, montre-moi la lumière...

source: TEXT_JOBDRK520_02060_VANUVANU02060_000_128<tab>What tempestuous winds rage beneath tranquil clouds!? What great spirit dwells within you!?
target: TEXT_JOBDRK520_02060_VANUVANU02060_000_128<tab>Quels sont ces vents tempétueux qui soufflent sous les nuages paisibles<var 1D /var>!? Quel est cet esprit supérieur qui sommeille en toi<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_JOBDRK520_02060_SIDURGU_000_129<tab>...Speak plain, Vanu.
target: TEXT_JOBDRK520_02060_SIDURGU_000_129<tab>Sois plus clair, Vanu Vanu<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBDRK520_02060_VANUVANU02060_000_130<tab>This is no child...this is... Ah!
target: TEXT_JOBDRK520_02060_VANUVANU02060_000_130<tab>L'enfant, elle n'est pas... Aaah<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBDRK520_02060_VANUVANU02060_000_131<tab>The tramontane follows you, netherlings. You cannot remain here! Begone from our lands!
target: TEXT_JOBDRK520_02060_VANUVANU02060_000_131<tab>Vous êtes suivis par des nuages funestes, gens d'en bas... Vous ne pouvez pas rester ici. Retournez d'où vous venez<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBDRK520_02060_SIDURGU_000_132<tab>Wait! I don't... Godsdammit.
target: TEXT_JOBDRK520_02060_SIDURGU_000_132<tab>Attends<var 1D /var>! Ça ne... Merde.

source: TEXT_JOBDRK520_02060_SIDURGU_000_133<tab>Ready your blade, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. We've been followed.
target: TEXT_JOBDRK520_02060_SIDURGU_000_133<tab>Prépare ton arme, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Nous avons été suivis.

source: TEXT_JOBDRK520_02060_SIDURGU_000_134<tab>Over there─someone's coming...
target: TEXT_JOBDRK520_02060_SIDURGU_000_134<tab>Va voir ce que c'est, je reste avec Rielle.

source: TEXT_JOBDRK520_02060_SIDURGU_000_140<tab>Climb the ridge and stand watch. I'm staying with Rielle.
target: TEXT_JOBDRK520_02060_SIDURGU_000_140<tab>Va vérifier la route, je reste avec Rielle.

source: TEXT_JOBDRK520_02060_RIELLE_000_145<tab>How did they find us!?
target: TEXT_JOBDRK520_02060_RIELLE_000_145<tab>Faites attention à vous<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBDRK520_02060_RIELLE_000_150<tab>So it really was them...
target: TEXT_JOBDRK520_02060_RIELLE_000_150<tab>Encore ces chevaliers...

source: TEXT_JOBDRK520_02060_SIDURGU_000_160<tab>That should be the last of them.
target: TEXT_JOBDRK520_02060_SIDURGU_000_160<tab>Des templiers... Aucun doute, ils sont venus pour Rielle.

source: TEXT_JOBDRK520_02060_SIDURGU_000_161<tab>Hm. I've seen these ones about before. They don't answer to the lord commander─or so I hear.
target: TEXT_JOBDRK520_02060_SIDURGU_000_161<tab>Ce n'est pas la première fois que je les vois, ceux-là. Je ne crois pas qu'ils obéissent au capitaine général en tout cas.

source: TEXT_JOBDRK520_02060_SIDURGU_100_161<tab>Bastards thought to take us outside the city, away from prying eyes...
target: TEXT_JOBDRK520_02060_SIDURGU_100_161<tab>Les ordures ont profité que nous soyons loin d'Ishgard, à l'abri des regards...

source: TEXT_JOBDRK520_02060_SIDURGU_000_162<tab>Don't want to be seen murdering a girl in the streets of the Holy See, do they!? Even their staunchest supporters couldn't abide that!
target: TEXT_JOBDRK520_02060_SIDURGU_000_162<tab>Ils n'ont pas envie que quelqu'un les voie assassiner une petite fille dans les rues de la cité, ça non... Même les plus fervents fidèles du Saint-Siège ne le toléreraient pas.

source: TEXT_JOBDRK520_02060_SIDURGU_000_163<tab>Seems our new friend has already abandoned us. Naught for it, then. Back to Ishgard we go.
target: TEXT_JOBDRK520_02060_SIDURGU_000_163<tab>On dirait que le chaman ne nous a pas attendus... Tant pis, retournons à Ishgard.

source: TEXT_JOBDRK520_02060_SIDURGU_000_164<tab>Come along, Rielle.
target: TEXT_JOBDRK520_02060_SIDURGU_000_164<tab>Viens, Rielle.

source: TEXT_JOBDRK520_02060_RIELLE_000_170<tab>You're not hurt, are you?
target: TEXT_JOBDRK520_02060_RIELLE_000_170<tab>... Vous n'êtes pas blessé<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var><var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_JOBDRK520_02060_SIDURGU_000_180<tab>I trust you no longer dispute the true nature of the Temple Knights.
target: TEXT_JOBDRK520_02060_SIDURGU_000_180<tab>J'espère que tu as compris à quoi t'en tenir avec les templiers, maintenant.

source: TEXT_JOBDRK520_02060_SIDURGU_000_181<tab>Murderers and thieves who drape themselves in the trappings of righteousness.
target: TEXT_JOBDRK520_02060_SIDURGU_000_181<tab>Derrière leurs grands airs de redresseurs de torts et leurs privilèges se cachent des voleurs et des assassins sans foi ni loi.

source: TEXT_JOBDRK520_02060_SIDURGU_000_182<tab>Do you not <var 1A 02 /var>see<var 1A 01 /var>, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>!? We are all that stands between them and their prey!
target: TEXT_JOBDRK520_02060_SIDURGU_000_182<tab>Est-ce que tu te rends compte, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var><var 1D /var>!? Nous sommes le dernier rempart entre eux et leurs proies<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBDRK520_02060_SIDURGU_000_183<tab>There is no justice for these monsters save that which we must deliver!
target: TEXT_JOBDRK520_02060_SIDURGU_000_183<tab>La seule justice devant laquelle ces monstres peuvent être jugés, c'est la nôtre<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBDRK520_02060_SIDURGU_000_184<tab>I will see them answer for their sins, I swear it! If I have to drown in the abyss to see it done, I will!
target: TEXT_JOBDRK520_02060_SIDURGU_000_184<tab>Même si pour cela je dois me sacrifier aux ténèbres, je les ferai payer pour leurs péchés, je le jure<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBDRK520_02060_RIELLE_000_185<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>!
target: TEXT_JOBDRK520_02060_RIELLE_000_185<tab>... Sid<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBDRK520_02060_RIELLE_000_186<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, Sid, I...I wanted to thank you both for protecting me earlier! And...apologize for getting you two hurt...
target: TEXT_JOBDRK520_02060_RIELLE_000_186<tab>Sid, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, je... je voulais vous remercier de m'avoir protégée, tout à l'heure<var 1D /var>! Je suis désolée que vous ayez été en danger par ma faute...

source: TEXT_JOBDRK520_02060_SIDURGU_000_187<tab>...Don't be foolish. You've naught to apologize for.
target: TEXT_JOBDRK520_02060_SIDURGU_000_187<tab>Ne dis pas de bêtises, voyons. Tu n'as pas à t'excuser.

source: TEXT_JOBDRK520_02060_SIDURGU_000_188<tab>In any case, at least we learned something of our enemies' motives.
target: TEXT_JOBDRK520_02060_SIDURGU_000_188<tab>Au moins, nous en savons un peu plus sur les motivations de nos ennemis.

source: TEXT_JOBDRK520_02060_SIDURGU_000_189<tab>Not that I have the faintest inkling of what the healer meant by “great spirit”...
target: TEXT_JOBDRK520_02060_SIDURGU_000_189<tab>Même si je n'ai pas la moindre idée de ce que ce chaman a voulu dire par “esprit supérieur”...
